thread.title: Baby that fell from Sharjah building dies of wounds
thread.title_full: Baby that fell from Sharjah building dies of wounds

title: Baby that fell from Sharjah building dies of wounds
text:
Filed on February 23, 2017 | Last updated on February 23, 2017 at 06.47 am Share Vote 
(Alamy) 
Picture of Al Shaibah building in Al Taawun area in Sharjah where 21 months baby fell on Saturday afternoon, 11 February 2017. (Juidin Bernarrd) He was brought to Al Qasimi hospital two weeks ago. The 21-months old Arab who fell off the third floor of a building in Al Taawun area died yesterday night. According to an official at the Al Qasimi hospital, the boy was brought in two weeks ago with internal bleeding and fractures in his legs. His condition was critical and underwent surgery. According to a police source they received a call on February 11th about the incident. Police patrols and ambulances arrived in the Al Shaiba building where the incident took place. They rushed him to the Al Qasimi hospital when they found the boy still alive. Parents said their son M.M was playing around and suddenly sneaked into the balcony which was unlocked at that time and fell. Police said the tragic incident happened due the parents' negligence. Afkar Abdullah
